Text: RE Invitation to Speakfor getting back to me Would you be able to recommend someone else from Enron who might be able to Thanks Jennie DApice Jennie Edwards DApice Institute for International Research mailto x voice fax rd Avenue th Floor New York NY Original Message From SMTP Sent Friday May PM To IRNYcom Subject RE Invitation to Speak Jennie I regret to inform you I am unable to speak at the conference due to earlier commitments Vince Original Message From Jennie DApice IRNYcomENRON mailtoIMCEANOTESJennieDApiceCJDApiceIIRNYEcomE NRONcom Sent Friday May PM To Subject Invitation to Speak Dear Mr Kaminski Hope your day is going well Philip Merrill suggested I contact you regarding a conference Im organizing on Implementing the Commodities Futures Modernization Act The conference will include sections on Single Stock Futures Clearing and Trading Facilities The latter section will include a session on the new electronic exchanges and I would like to invite Enron to speak on their electronic energy trading exchange The conference will take place September at The Drake Hotel in Chicago The session will be in the afternoon on Thursday September I expect the conference will draw executives from broker dealers futures commissions merchants commodity trading advisors commodity pool operators introducing brokers investment banks exchanges and clearing firms The Institute for International Research IIR is the worlds largest international conference company with different business units and employees in countries Founded in by Irvine Laidlaw the current Chairman IIR continues to provide unbiased bleedingedge business information through our conferences workshops seminars and the Internet For more information on IIR please visit our website at A draft agenda is attached for your review Please note it is a work in progress and I will be finalizing it over the next week I welcome any feedback on how to improve the program as well as any speaker suggestions Thanks again for your assistance Ill followup with you next week but please feel free to contact me in the interim with any questions Enjoy your weekend Jennie DApice Agendadoc Jennie Edwards DApice Institute for International Research mailto x voice fax rd Avenue th Floor New York NY Agendadoc File Agendadoc
